alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 28 at 12:10PM AKDT until October 28 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. Visibility reduced to as low as one half mile. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...Until 7 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could damage property and cause power outages. Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A potent low pressure system will move south of the Pribilofs today. Temperatures in the lower to mid 30s late this morning will continue to slowly fall throughout the afternoon, allowing the precipitation to remain all snow. The combination of snow and strong northeasterly winds will reduce visibility to one half mile at times. The snow will taper off from north to south across the Pribilofs through the early evening hours. The strongest winds are expected continue through this evening before slowly diminishing. However, northerly winds will remain gusty through Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
